comments:
I20050610-1757 (3.1RC2)

I have all line delimiter settings set to default (unchanged).

- create test class MyTest.java:
package tests;
import junit.framework.TestCase;
public class MyTest extends TestCase {
	public void test1() throws Exception { }
}

- select MyTest.java and choose New > JUnit Test Suite, click Finish
- select MyTest.java and choose New > JUnit Test Suite, click Finish

The second time, I get this exception:

Error 2005-06-14 10:35:02.664 Internal Error

Only happens when AllTests.java is open in a java editor.

Same happens when the test suite is open in the editor and recreate test suite
is called from the context menu

Created an attachment (id=23249)
Patch that fixes the problem

Dani, can you please cast your vote. This gives the impression that the wizard
messes up line delimiters, although it doesn't.

+1 for RC3.

-1 for 3.1 RC3. There's no added value except getting rid of the .log entry and
the fix is not a no-brainer.
Reviewed patch and released for build >= I20051122.
